body.name: Phone Tripod, TODI 63" Portable Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote & Phone Tripod Stand for Video Recording, Travel Tripod for Phone, Cell Phone Tripod Compatible with Phone 15/14/13 Pro Max（White）

features: Selfie Stick Tripod All-in-one Design: Our Portable Tripod boasts an advanced and compact engineering, providing the utmost in portability and space-saving design. Effortlessly fold and store it in a mere second, guaranteeing your travel convenience.

Adjustable Tripod for Phone: The telescopic pole allows for flexible height adjustments, ranging from a minimum of 14 inches to 63 inches. The upgraded phone holder provides a 360° rotation. Catering to various shooting angles and heights with cell phone tripod, ensuring that you capture the perfect shot every time.

Phone Tripod With Remote Photography: Equipped with a detachable wireless remote control, our selfie stick tripod breaks the barriers of shooting distances, supporting a maximum range of 33 feet. You can capture shots at your own pace and creatively express yourself without the need for assistance with your iPhone tripod stand.

Excellent Materials: The Compact Tripod telescopic pole is made from aerospace-grade aluminum alloy, enhancing its sturdiness and compactness. The tripod legs are constructed using nylon and fibers, reinforcing heat resistance, and longevity. The secondary leg support axis is manufactured from zinc alloy, augmenting hardness and lifespan.

Wide Compatibility: TODI tripod perfect for various activities like selfies, vlogging, group photos, and content creation on social media platforms such as Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and Twitter. It securely holds smartphones with widths from 2.2" to 3.7", including popular models like iPhone 15/14/13/12/11 Pro Max Mini SE, Galaxy S23/S22 Ultra/Note, Google Pixel 6/5, OnePlus, and even accessories like microphones.

Best Service for Portable Phone Tripod: TODI offer a comprehensive after-sales service that includes a one-year warranty on tripod for cell phone. Our commitment to your satisfaction extends to our timely responsiveness – you can expect a prompt reply within 12 hours to address any inquiries or concerns you may have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Versatile at a Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent design that's very compact and portable. Easy to open. Phone holder is adjustable and tilts at all angles. The extendable arm gives you many length options. And the tripod stand is easy to open and sturdy. Extremely impressed with the quality of this tripod/self stick. The pricing is very affordable. Highly, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that it’s small enough to pack in my tote bag but expands to a great height for picture taking while traveling. Great product. I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for moms who love family pictures!
reviews.reviewText: Was SO easy to use and compact. Love that it came with a remote. Have it to my MIL who buy herself everything already. Was perfect for family Christmas pictures when we had no one else to take it for us! Feels very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bluetooth button doesn't even work?!
reviews.reviewText: The stick may have a sleek design and a great base for the tripod but the stupid Bluetooth button doesn't even work?!? What kind of quality services are being provided if the first thing that I pull out of the box doesn't even function?Update: they contacted me and actually sent one that works. Bumping to 4 stars from 2 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Very sturdy, and easy set up! Can be used as a selfie stick aswell added remote and very compact makes easy to Carry along with me on vacations too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a few tripods in my time but these guys have figured it out and produced a quality product. Didn’t get top heavy at full extension. Very sturdy and doesn’t feel cheap but well within the budget. Give them a go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I make a lot of videos and this works like a charm and is very easy to use. It securely holds my iPhone in place and is easily adjustable in height. Folds down easily into itself. No extra case for carrying needed. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Man I love this thing!
reviews.reviewText: I do a lot of fashion photography and videography so this stand comes in very useful when I’m outside, and I need to take pictures for myself! The remote control Kind of sucks though.
